content:
Our backend allows org admin(who aren't subscribed) to public streams(not private stream) to update stream settings like(name/description/property) and our frontend code doesn't allow org admin to update stream settings if org admin is not subscribed.
Which one we should set here?

  • Allow org admin to update settings of public stream regardless of subscribed or not
  • Only allow org admin if subscribed to stream

We should definitely clear this picture before more implementing in stream admin.
We should allow org admins to make any changes they want to public streams, without forcing them to subscribe.
Please review PR #8029, so I can rebase the changes.
